description: Install dependencies and verify the existing app builds and runs correctly per README instructions (npm install, npm start).
steps: Run `cd /projects/sandbox/terminal-chat-server && npm install` to install all dependencies (express, multer, socket.io)
Run `npm start` in background and verify server starts on port 3000 with the expected 'Server running on port 3000' output
Stop the background server after confirming it starts successfully
acceptance_criteria: npm start launches the server and prints 'Server running on port 3000'
verification: Run `cd /projects/sandbox/terminal-chat-server && npm install` and confirm exit code 0
Run `npm start` in background, wait a few seconds, verify server is listening, then stop it
findings: npm install completed with 102 packages, 1 low severity vulnerability (non-blocking). Server starts successfully on port 3000 with auto-cleanup for messages older than 12 hours. No build step needed - just npm install + npm start.
